class.rdfs:comment: A delivery service through which content is provided via broadcast over the air or online.
class.rdfs:label: BroadcastService

schema:area.rdfs:comment: The area within which users can expect to reach the broadcast service.
schema:area.rdfs:label: area

schema:broadcastAffiliateOf.rdfs:comment: The media network(s) whose content is broadcast on this station.
schema:broadcastAffiliateOf.rdfs:label: broadcastAffiliateOf

schema:broadcastDisplayName.rdfs:comment: The name displayed in the channel guide. For many US affiliates, it is the network name.
schema:broadcastDisplayName.rdfs:label: broadcastDisplayName

schema:broadcastTimezone.rdfs:comment: The timezone in ISO 8601 format for which the service bases its broadcasts
schema:broadcastTimezone.rdfs:label: broadcastTimezone

schema:broadcaster.rdfs:comment: The organization owning or operating the broadcast service.
schema:broadcaster.rdfs:label: broadcaster

schema:parentService.rdfs:comment: A broadcast service to which the broadcast service may belong to such as regional variations of a national channel.
schema:parentService.rdfs:label: parentService

schema:videoFormat.rdfs:comment: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).
schema:videoFormat.rdfs:label: videoFormat
